TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstallContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 含有目前安裝的相關資訊。

span.span: Contains information about the current installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，由安裝建立可執行檔，例如 InstallUtil.exe，安裝組件。Typically, an is created by an installation executable, such as InstallUtil.exe, that installs assemblies. 安裝程式會叫用建構函式，將其傳遞預設記錄檔的路徑和命令列參數。The installation program invokes the constructor, passing it the default log-file path and command-line parameters. 然後才會呼叫其， ， ，或方法，安裝程式會設定為屬性的執行個體。Prior to calling its , , , or methods, the installation program sets the property of an to the instance of . 然後再呼叫這些方法， ，其中包含在安裝程式集合屬性集每個包含安裝程式的屬性。Before calling these methods, an that contains an installer collection in the property sets the property of each contained installer. 屬性包含已剖析的輸入來執行可執行安裝程式的命令列版本。The property contains a parsed version of the command line that is entered to run the installation executable. 屬性包含的資訊，例如記錄檔、 是否要顯示在主控台中，記錄資訊，以及是否要在安裝期間，顯示使用者介面的路徑。The property contains information such as the path to a log file, whether to display log information on the console, and whether to show a user interface during the installation. 呼叫方法來找出命令列參數是否`true`。Call the method to find out whether a command-line parameter is `true`. 使用方法，將寫入安裝記錄檔和主控台的狀態訊息。Use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. ## Examples 下列範例會示範建構函式，屬性和和方法類別。The following example demonstrates the constructors, the property and the and methods of the class. 當呼叫安裝程式的方法時，它會檢查是否有從命令列參數。When the method of the installer is called, it checks for parameters from the command line. 根據它會顯示進度訊息至主控台，並將它儲存至指定的記錄檔。Depending on that, it displays the progress messages onto the console and also saves it to the specified log file. 當沒有任何引數為空白叫用程式建立。When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty is created. 時"/ 記錄檔 」 和 「 / LogtoConsole"都有指定，由傳遞個別的引數至。When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the is created by passing the respective arguments to . [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載不會建立安裝記錄檔。This overload does not create a log file for the installation. ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用其中一個多載版本建構函式。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the constructor. 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. 當沒有任何引數為空白叫用程式建立。When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty is created. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#2)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string logFilePath, string[] commandLine) cil managed
Public Sub New (logFilePath As String, commandLine As String())

param.name: logFilePath
param.span: 這個安裝的記錄檔路徑，或 (如果不應建立記錄檔)。

span.span: The path to the log file for this installation, or if no log file should be created.

param.name: commandLine
param.span: 執行安裝程式時所輸入的命令列參數，或 (如果未輸入任何命令列參數)。

span.span: The command-line parameters entered when running the installation program, or if none were entered.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並且建立安裝的記錄檔。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, and creates a log file for the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果安裝是使用[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)，這個建構函式建立的記錄檔位於指定路徑並剖析到命令列參數陣列之屬性。If the installation uses [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md), this constructor creates a log file at the specified path and parses the array of command-line parameters into the property. 如果命令列參數中指定的記錄檔路徑，它用來建立檔案。If a log-file path is specified in the command-line parameters, it is used to create the file. 如果在命令列中的值未指定記錄檔引數`logFilePath`使用參數。If the log file argument is not specified in the command line, the value of the `logFilePath` parameter is used. 若要隱藏在記錄檔的建立，傳遞"/ logfile ="命令列參數。To suppress the creation of a log file, pass the "/logfile= " command-line parameter. ## Examples 這個範例是摘錄自類別概觀中的範例類別。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 時"/ 記錄檔 」 和 「 / LogtoConsole"都有指定，由傳遞個別的引數至。When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the is created by passing the respective arguments to . [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#3)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#3)]

para.span: 將您的預設記錄檔路徑中時呼叫這個建構函式的參數。

span.span: Pass your default log-file path in the parameter when you call this constructor.

para.span: 這是 where 建立記錄檔時，除非執行安裝可執行檔時，會使用 /logfile 命令列參數。

span.span: This is the where the log file is created, unless the /logfile command-line parameter is used when the installation executable is run.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsParameterTrue(string paramName) cil managed
Public Function IsParameterTrue (paramName As String) As Boolean

param.name: paramName
param.span: 要檢查的命令列參數名稱。

span.span: The name of the command-line parameter to check.

summary.span: 判斷指定的命令列參數是否為 。

span.span: Determines whether the specified command-line parameter is .

returns.span: 如果指定的參數設定為「yes」、「true」、「1」或空字串 ("")，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified parameter is set to "yes", "true", "1", or an empty string (""); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會存取屬性，其中包含的命令列參數，以判斷指定的參數是否為剖析的版本`true`。This method accesses the property, which contains a parsed version of the command-line parameters, to determine whether the specified parameter is `true`. ## Examples 這個範例是摘錄自類別概觀中的範例類別。This example is an excerpt of the sample in the class overview of the class. 它會使用方法，以找出是否`LogtoConsole`參數已設定。It uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果`yes`，它接著會使用方法，將寫入安裝記錄檔和主控台的狀態訊息。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#4)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LogMessage(string message) cil managed

summary.span: 將訊息寫入主控台和安裝的記錄檔。

span.span: Writes a message to the console and to the log file for the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安裝程式可以呼叫這個方法來寫入記錄檔中的 [進度] 或其他狀態資訊。An installer can call this method to write progress or other status information to the log file. 安裝程式命令列參數指定應該顯示使用者介面，如果應該顯示訊息方塊或進行查詢，除了呼叫方法。If the command-line parameters specify that a user interface should be displayed, the installer should show message boxes or make queries in addition to calling the method. 文字寫入至記錄檔將無法由使用者所看見，除非 InstallUtil.exe 用來執行安裝和 「 / LogToConsole = true 」 命令列中指定。Text written to the log file will not be seen by the user unless InstallUtil.exe is used to run the installation and "/LogToConsole= true" is specified in the command line. ## Examples 這個範例是摘錄自類別概觀中的範例類別。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 它會使用方法，以找出是否`LogtoConsole`參數已設定。It uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果`yes`，它接著會使用方法，將寫入安裝記錄檔和主控台的狀態訊息。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#4)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As StringDictionary

summary.span: 取得當執行 InstallUtil.exe 時所輸入的命令列參數。

span.span: Gets the command-line parameters that were entered when InstallUtil.exe was run.

value.span: ，表示當執行安裝可執行檔時所輸入的命令列參數。

span.span: A that represents the command-line parameters that were entered when the installation executable was run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當新建立時，命令列參數會剖析成屬性。When a new is created, the command-line parameters are parsed into the property. 索引鍵與參數的值均為字串。Both the keys and the values of the parameters are strings. ## Examples 這個範例是摘錄自類別概觀中的範例類別。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 此範例會擷取屬性來查看使用者若尚未輸入任何命令列引數。The sample retrieves the property to see if any command line argument has been entered by the user. 它也會使用方法，以找出是否`LogtoConsole`參數已設定。It also uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果`yes`，它接著會使用方法，將寫入安裝記錄檔和主控台的狀態訊息。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#6)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig class System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary ParseCommandLine(string[] args) cil managed
Protected Shared Function ParseCommandLine (args As String()) As StringDictionary

span.span: An array containing the command-line parameters.

summary.span: 剖析命令列參數為字串字典。

span.span: Parses the command-line parameters into a string dictionary.
A containing the parsed command-line parameters.
